text: Saint-Paul, Réunion is the second largest city in Réunion. The largest is Saint-Denis. In 2008, a train which connects Saint-Paul to Saint-Denis and the main international airport in Réunion will be completed. ==References== ==Other websites== * (in French) Paul Category:Communes in Réunion Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Saint-Paul, Réunion
